articles.description: NBA 2K and Grand Theft Auto publisher Take-Two Interactive is buying Codemasters, the publisher behind the F1, Dirt, Project CARS, and Grid racing game franchises.
articles.content: Take-Two Interactive, the publisher of 2K Games, 2K Sports, and Rockstar Games titles, is buying Codemasters, the folks who make Dirt, Grid, and F1 racing games. The $994 million deal is expected to … [+1086 chars]

articles.title: iPhone 12 Pro Max review: A big phone with big battery energy - CNET
articles.description: With a big battery, outstanding cameras and the largest screen ever on an iPhone, the 12 Pro Max deserves a spot in your pocket -- if you can get it to fit.
articles.content:
The iPhone 12 Pro Max has the largest screen ever on an iPhone.
Patrick Holland/CNET
